---
title: "Inspect Data for Given Station"
params:
  station_id: 02276998
  parameter: Disch
---

```{R}
station_id <- params$station_id

source("R/getData.R")
df <- getData(station_id, "Disch")
```

```{R}
# Calculate a moving average
library(zoo)
df$moving_avg <- rollmean(df$value, k = 30, fill = NA, align = "center")

# Create the time series plot
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(df, aes(x = datetime, y = value)) +
  geom_point(shape = 4, color = "black", alpha = 0.1) +  # Transparent blue "x"
  geom_line(aes(y = moving_avg), color = "blue", size = 1) +  # Moving average line
  labs(
    title = "Time Series Plot",
    x = "Datetime",
    y = "Value"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
